SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summaryOff: If somebody gathers your master password (or token) the pin is the only protection anymore. Self destruction may protect your data in a hard way. Ensure you have always a backup of your vault!
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summaryOn: If somebody gathers your master password (or token) the pin is the only protection anymore. Self destruction is activated after defined maximum login attempts. Ensure you have always a backup of your vault!
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: DROP VAULT(!!!) after max failed login attempts

SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summaryOff: Master password can be typed manually or scanned from QR code
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summaryOn: Opens the QR code scanner immediately if master password is not stored on device and logs in afterwards
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Scan master password QR code and login immediately

SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summaryOff: Master password can also be read from NFC tag
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summaryOn: Opens the NFC tag reader immediately if master password is not stored on device and logs in afterwards
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Read master password NFC tag and login immediately
